title: Closing with Confidence
objective: Guide the guest to a clear, confident decision by presenting numbers simply, confirming alignment with their priorities, addressing concerns calmly, and asking for commitment without pressure.
learning_outcomes: Present numbers with clarity and calm confidence (no overwhelm).
Use a simple close structure: recap → numbers → confirm → commit.
Separate questions vs concerns vs objections during the close.
Use two-option choice architecture to reduce anxiety and delay.
Handle common closing stalls ("I need to think", "I want to shop", payment).
Ask for commitment in a respectful, professional way.
End with clean next steps so the guest feels in control.
